channel.title: Systematizing Systematization of Knowledge
channel.description: Recent content on Systematizing Systematization of Knowledge

item.title: Systematizing Systematization of Knowledge - Authors

item.title: Systematizing Systematization of Knowledge - Other Conferences
item.description: Other Conferences Since IEEE Security and Privacy started the SoK papers in 2010, several other venues have also include SoK papers. (Please let me know if you know of any others that are not listed here.) Security Conferences ACM Workshop on Artificial Intelligence and Security (started in 2012, continuing) IEEE European Symposium on Security and Privacy (EuroOakland) (since first edition in 2016) Privacy Enhancing Technologies Symposium (PETS) (since 2016) Symposium on Usable Privacy and Security (SOUPS) (started in 2019)
